languages.text: {n}Глядя вам в глаза, проповедник несколько раз было открывает рот, но не решается произнести что-либо. Брови его хмурятся, а губы подрагивают.{/n} "Я... я не могу молвить сего, ибо это не будет правдой".

{n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."
languages.original_text: {n}Глядя вам в глаза, проповедник несколько раз было открывает рот, но не решается произнести что-либо. Брови его хмурятся, а губы подрагивают.{/n} "Я... я не могу молвить сего, ибо это не будет правдой".

traits.locale_text: {n}The preacher looks you in the eye and opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

{n}The preacher looks you in the eye and opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

{n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

{n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

{n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

languages.text: {n}牧师直视着你的双眼，几次张开嘴想说些什么，但却始终无法鼓起勇气。他皱着眉头，嘴唇抽搐着。{/n}“我……我说不出这种话，因为这是在说谎。”
languages.original_text: {n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师直视着你的双眼，几次张开嘴想说些什么，但却始终无法鼓起勇气。他皱着眉头，嘴唇抽搐着。{/n}“我……我说不出这种话，因为这是在说谎。”

languages.text: {n}あなたの目を見たプリーチャーは、何かを言おうと何度か口を開いたが、その勇気が出なかったらしい。眉をひそめて唇を歪める。{/n}「わ、私は、その様なことを言う事はできません。嘘になりますから」
languages.original_text: {n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの目を見たプリーチャーは、何かを言おうと何度か口を開いたが、その勇気が出なかったらしい。眉をひそめて唇を歪める。{/n}「わ、私は、その様なことを言う事はできません。嘘になりますから」

languages.text: {n}El predicador abre la boca varias veces mientras te mira a los ojos, pero no se atreve a decir nada. Frunce el ceño y sus labios se mueven.{/n} «No... no puedo decir eso, porque sería mentira».
languages.original_text: {n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

traits.locale_text: {n}El predicador abre la boca varias veces mientras te mira a los ojos, pero no se atreve a decir nada. Frunce el ceño y sus labios se mueven.{/n} «No... no puedo decir eso, porque sería mentira».

languages.text: {n}Der Priester blickt dir in die Augen und öffnet mehrfach den Mund, um etwas zu sagen, bringt jedoch nie den Mut auf. Er runzelt die Stirn und seine Lippen zucken.{/n} "I-Ich kann das nicht sagen, denn es wäre nicht wahr."
languages.original_text: {n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester blickt dir in die Augen und öffnet mehrfach den Mund, um etwas zu sagen, bringt jedoch nie den Mut auf. Er runzelt die Stirn und seine Lippen zucken.{/n} "I-Ich kann das nicht sagen, denn es wäre nicht wahr."

languages.text: {n}Le prêcheur plonge son regard dans le vôtre et ouvre plusieurs fois la bouche, sans toutefois parvenir à proférer le moindre mot. Au bout d'un moment, il fronce les sourcils, les lèvres tremblantes.{/n} « Je... J'en suis incapable, car ce serait un mensonge. »
languages.original_text: {n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prêcheur plonge son regard dans le vôtre et ouvre plusieurs fois la bouche, sans toutefois parvenir à proférer le moindre mot. Au bout d'un moment, il fronce les sourcils, les lèvres tremblantes.{/n} « Je... J'en suis incapable, car ce serait un mensonge. »

languages.text: {n}Gözlerinin içine bakan vaiz, bir şeyler söylemek için birkaç kez ağzını açsa da gereken cesareti bir türlü kendinde bulamıyor. Kaşları çatılıyor, dudakları seğiriyor.{/n} "Ben... Ben bunu söyleyemem. Yalan olur."
languages.original_text: {n}Looking into your eyes, the preacher opens his mouth several times to say something, but never musters the courage. He frowns, and his lips twitch.{/n} "I— I cannot utter that, for it would be untrue."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vaiz gözlerinin içine bakıyor, bir şeyler söylemek için birkaç kez ağzını açıyor ancak gereken cesareti bir türlü kendinde bulamıyor. Kaşları çatılıyor, dudakları seğiriyor.{/n} "Ben... Ben bunu söyleyemem. Yalan olur."
